text:
@RyanAFournier @HindmanDebra I told you the global Warming people were the coronavirus people.
You just didn't listen so they had to release a virus its for the children don't you want to cure cancer they can end poverty? 
Depopulation is for the good of society not just the world.
They believe this shit.
